comment.body:
The classID is a global ID for persistent objects. It is used e.g. for mapping inheritance hierarchies to databases in object relational mapping. The classID is maintained and managed manually and must be unique within the whole UML model.
JEAF Generator will check and ensure it’s uniqueness and will produce an error if this constraint is not met. It’s recommended to work with value ranges for for Class-IDs if your model becomes a little larger.
